verbs.description: LeBron James [V: does] not see a White House visit as a possibility for the Cavaliers or the Warriors , and criticized President Donald Trump 's decision to uninvite the Eagles .

[ARG0: LeBron James] does [ARGM-NEG: not] [V: see] [ARG1: a White House visit] [ARGM-MNR: as a possibility for the Cavaliers or the Warriors] , and criticized President Donald Trump 's decision to uninvite the Eagles .
